title: Implement User Authentication
description:
The User Authentication feature is crucial for ensuring that users can securely access their accounts. This task involves:

- Designing the login interface.
- Implementing secure password storage.
- Setting up two-factor authentication.
The goal is to provide a seamless experience while maintaining high security standards. Ensure that the authentication process is user-friendly and efficient.

title: Optimize Performance of the Application
description:
Optimizing the performance of the application is crucial for user satisfaction. This task involves:

- Analyzing current performance metrics.
- Identifying bottlenecks in the code.
- Implementing performance improvements.
The goal is to ensure that the application runs smoothly, even under heavy load.

title: Finalize Documentation for the Project
description:
Documentation is essential for both users and developers. This task includes:

- Writing user manuals.
- Creating API documentation.
- Compiling developer guides.
The goal is to ensure that all aspects of the project are well-documented for future reference.

title: Implement Market Analysis Tools
description:
The Market Analysis Tools will provide users with insights into market trends. This task includes:

- Developing charts for price tracking.
- Implementing indicators for market analysis.
- Ensuring real-time data updates.
These tools will empower users to make informed investment decisions.

title: Conduct User Testing for the Platform
description:
User testing is essential to ensure that the platform meets user needs. This task includes:

- Recruiting test users.
- Creating test scenarios.
- Collecting feedback and making adjustments.
The goal is to identify any usability issues before the official launch.

title: Prepare for Project Launch
description:
Preparing for the project launch is critical to ensure a smooth rollout. This task involves:

- Finalizing marketing materials.
- Setting up support channels.
- Coordinating with stakeholders.
The goal is to ensure that everything is in place for a successful launch.

title: Post-Launch Review and Feedback Collection
description:
After the launch, it's essential to gather feedback from users. This task includes:

- Analyzing user feedback.
- Identifying areas for improvement.
- Planning for future updates.
The goal is to ensure that the platform continues to meet user needs after launch.

title: Set Up Notifications for Users
description:
Setting up notifications is crucial for keeping users informed about their investments. This task involves:

- Designing notification settings.
- Implementing alerts for price changes.
- Testing notification delivery methods.
Notifications should be customizable to enhance user experience.

title: Create Wallet Integration
description:
Integrating a cryptocurrency wallet is essential for users to manage their assets. This task includes:

- Researching wallet APIs.
- Implementing wallet connection features.
- Testing wallet transactions.
The integration should support multiple cryptocurrencies and ensure that transactions are secure and efficient.

title: Develop Transaction History Feature
description:
The Transaction History feature allows users to view their past transactions. This task involves:

- Designing the transaction history interface.
- Implementing backend logic to retrieve transaction data.
- Ensuring data accuracy and security.
This feature is vital for users to track their investment performance over time.

title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
description: Build a comprehensive analytics dashboard with real-time metrics, custom reports, and data visualization

title: Build Real-time Notification System
description: Implement real-time notifications using WebSocket, support email/SMS/push notifications, add notification preferences UI
